articles.author: Claire Jones
articles.title: Federal Reserve officials were open to further US rate rises to quell inflation - Financial Times
articles.description: Hawkish signals from some central bank members came before recent data pointing to cooling price pressures
articles.content: Some US Federal Reserve officials signalled they would be prepared to raise interest rates further if inflation became more aggressive, according to a record of their last meeting at the start of May… [+2430 chars]
